import React, { useRef } from "react"; import styles from './UseForm.module.css'; const UserForm = (props) => { const [enteredName, setEnteredName] = useRef(''); const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const cardData = {name: enteredName}; props.onCardInfo(cardData) } const cardNameHandler = (event) => { setEnteredName(event.target.value); } return








} export default UserForm;
